products.name: Oil Chiller - Water-Cooled Reciprocating
products.condenser: Water-cooled (shell and tube or fin & tube designs)
products.applications: Hydraulic/lube/cutting oil cooling in industrial settings.
products.features: Purpose-built for oil circuits, precise temperature control, robust operation, and energy efficiency.

specifications.refrigerant: R404A, R407C, R-134a, Ammonia, CO2 (eco-friendly options)
specifications.operating_temperature_range: Can achieve very low temperatures (e.g., -50°C for brine), condensing temperatures up to 45°C.
specifications.control_systems: Microprocessor control panels, precision temperature and pressure controls, electronic expansion valves.

products.name: Air Oil Chiller
products.applications: Oil systems where water is limited, hydraulic systems, lubrication systems, spindle cooling, CNC machines.
products.features: Broad compressor choice, rugged MS body, precise temperature control, and energy efficiency.

specifications.operating_fluids: Mineral oils, oil/water emulsions, water glycol, phosphate ester, synthetic oils, vegetable oils.

products.name: Glycol / Brine Chillers
products.applications: Food processing (breweries, dairy, meat), chemical plants, pharmaceuticals, cold storage facilities, ice production, and general industrial process cooling.
products.features: Low-temp capability with glycol/brine, precise temperature control (within ±1°C), and advanced control systems with connectivity options.

specifications.cooling_capacity: 1 KW to 2000 KW (or 1/2 HP to 300 HP)
specifications.evaporators: Shell and tube or plate heat exchangers (316 stainless steel or titanium for brine)

products.name: Medical Chillers (Copper/Brine type)
products.condenser: Water-cooled (plate type, shell and tube) or air-cooled
products.applications: MRI/CT, blood cooling, laboratories, and other healthcare applications requiring precise temperature control.
products.features: Customization for zero-downtime medical duty, precise temperature control, robust construction, and various safety mechanisms.

specifications.temperature_range: -40°C to +30°C (some models to -270°C for cryogenic applications)

products.name: Central/Industrial Cooling System
products.applications: Engineered plant-wide systems for large HVACR setups, industrial processes, and various commercial applications.
products.features: End-to-end supply & integration, precise temperature control, robust operation, and energy efficiency.

specifications.system_types: Chiller (air-cooled, water-cooled), cooling tower, evaporative cooler, direct expansion (DX) system, VRF/VRV, adiabatic cooling.
specifications.control_systems: Microprocessor control panels, PLC-based units with remote operation and data logging.
specifications.refrigerant: R404A, R407C, R-134a, Ammonia, CO2 (eco-friendly options)
